title: Wrong Icon for Recipe
description: If I'm not mistaken, isn't that the THERMAL GENERATOR icon in the recipe output?

replies.body: It is looking like the thermal generator, well you can add another file and replace his.
Could you please delete the old files for me? The new, corrected ones will be diesel_gen_recipe1c and 2c
All good, old files are gone :)

Just a note : beware when adding recipes with iridium plates, as there are "iridium plates" made with iridium ingots and "reinforced iridium plates" made with 4 iridium plates, 4 adv alloy and one ind. diamond.
Oh, another thing that should be changed, redirect all "material plate" to the plate bending machine, instead of covers.

Talking too much : Iridium alloy plates should redirect to a new page explaining how they are made, which ends up linking to the implosion compressor. I can't do this atm as i'm not using my main computer, due technical problems.
